file_insights.changes_made: Enhanced skeleton loading state UI with structured card layout

details.height_adjustment: Increased timeline connector height from 80 to 120 pixels
details.skeleton_replacement: Replaced simple rectangular skeleton with compound Card-based skeleton structure
new_elements: Text skeleton elements with varied widths (60% and 40%)
details.spacing_additions: Added gap and margin spacing for visual hierarchy

patterns_discovered.description: Combining multiple skeleton primitives (circular, text, rectangular) within a Card layout to create realistic loading placeholders that match the final content structure
Using varied skeleton widths (60%, 40%) and sizes to indicate different content types (title, subtitle, action)
patterns_discovered.context: Better visual communication of content structure during loading

patterns_discovered.description: Adjusting connector line height (80→120) to match expanded skeleton card height for visual alignment

gotchas_discovered.description: Building realistic loading states requires matching the exact structure of final content (avatar, title, subtitle, action), which can become verbose but is necessary for good UX
gotchas_discovered.impact: Code maintenance - skeleton markup must be kept in sync with actual content components

gotchas_discovered.description: When increasing skeleton card height, the timeline connector vertical line must be adjusted proportionally to maintain visual alignment
gotchas_discovered.impact: Visual consistency - mismatched heights would create broken timeline appearance

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented enhanced loading state skeleton cards for inspection history timeline
key_accomplishments: Replaced basic rectangular skeleton with compound Card-based skeleton structure
Created realistic loading UI with multiple skeleton types (circular, text, rectangular)
Maintained timeline visual consistency by adjusting connector height
Improved perceived loading experience with structured placeholder that matches final content

recommendations.rationale: The compound skeleton structure (Card + CircularSkeleton + TextSkeletons) should be extracted into a reusable component to avoid duplication if used elsewhere
recommendations.implementation: Create InspectionCardSkeleton.tsx component encapsulating the Card/CardContent/Skeleton structure

recommendations.rationale: Document the relationship between actual InspectionCard content structure and its skeleton version to prevent drift during future refactoring
recommendations.implementation: Add comments linking skeleton structure to corresponding actual card elements

recommendations.rationale: Verify skeleton animations are visually appealing and don't cause layout shift when transitioning from skeleton to actual content
recommendations.implementation: Add visual regression tests or manual testing checklist for loading state transitions

recommendations.rationale: If skeleton pulses are implemented, ensure timing matches actual data load time for better perceived performance
recommendations.implementation: Review MUI Skeleton animation defaults or customize animation timing
